properties.description: Creation of a view of organisation unit for PBI Reports

source:
%%sql

-- CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_db.vw_mipins_hr_protected_data

-- AS

SELECT DISTINCT
		T10.CalendarDate AS PCDate,
		T10.CalendarMonth AS PCMonth,
		T10.MonthOfYear AS MonthInt,
		-- T10.MonthOfYear AS PCMonthLatest, ----
		-- T10.MonthYearLatest_SortKey MonthYearLatestSortKey, ---- 
		-- T10.Year AS PCYear,
		-- T10.FY AS PCFY,
		-- T10.[FY Latest] AS PCFYLatest,
		-- T10. AS FYLatestSortKey,
		T1.SourceID AS RefNumber,
		T2.Description AS DisabilityText,
		CASE 
			WHEN T2.Description IS NULL THEN 'No Record'
			WHEN T2.Description = 'DISABLED' THEN 'Yes'
			WHEN T2.Description = 'NOT DISABLED' THEN 'No'
			WHEN T2.Description IN ('PREFER NOT TO SAY','Not disclosed','Do not wish to disclose') THEN 'Unknown'
		END AS Disabled,
		T3.Description AS EthnicOrigin,
		CASE WHEN T3.Description IS NULL THEN 'No Record'
			WHEN T3.Description LIKE 'White%' THEN 'White'
			WHEN T3.Description IN ('PREFER NOT TO SAY','Not disclosed','Do not wish to disclose','Unknown','0','Not known') THEN 'Unknown'
		   ELSE 'BME'
		END AS Ethnicity,
		T4.ReligionCode AS ReligiousDenominationKey,
		CASE WHEN T1.ReligionID IS NULL THEN 'No Record'
			WHEN T4.ReligionCode IN ('None','Agnostic / Atheist') OR LEFT([Religious Denomination Key],3) IN ('ath','agn') THEN 'Agnostic / Atheist'
			WHEN T4.ReligionCode = 'Christian' THEN 'Christian'
			WHEN T4.ReligionCode IN ('PREFER NOT TO SAY','Not disclosed','Do not wish to disclose','Unknown','0') THEN 'Unknown'
		   ELSE 'Other Religion'
		END AS Religion,
		T5.Description AS SxO,
		CASE 
			WHEN T5.Description IS NULL THEN 'No Record'
			WHEN T5.Description ='Heterosexual' THEN 'Heterosexual'
			WHEN LEFT(T5.Description,3) IN ('Gay','Les','Bis') THEN 'LGBT'
			WHEN T5.Description IN ('PREFER NOT TO SAY','Not disclosed','Do not wish to disclose','Unknown','Other','0') THEN 'Unknown'
		    ELSE 'Other'
		END AS SexualOrientation

	--FROM sap_hr.protected_data a
	FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_secure_info_fact T1
	LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_disability_dim T2 ON T1.DisabilityID = T2.DisabilityID and T2.IsActive = 'Y'
	LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_diversity_dim T3 ON T1.DiversityID = T3.DiversityID and T3.IsActive = 'Y'
	LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_religion_dim T4 ON T1.ReligionID = T4.ReligionID and T4.IsActive = 'Y'
	LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_sxo_dim T5 ON T1.SXOID = T5.SXOID and T5.IsActive = 'Y'
	LEFT OUTER JOIN  default.calendar_dim_plus T10 ON T1.IngestionDate = T10.CalendarDate

%%sql
SELECT * 
FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_secure_info_fact T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_religion_dim T4 ON T1.ReligionID = T4.ReligionID and T4.IsActive = 'Y'
